title: Can't build with Cargo resolver 2

labels.name: deficiency
labels.description: Something doesn't work as well as it could

body:
With a Cargo.toml using latest git version and [new feature resolver](https://doc.rust-lang.org/cargo/reference/resolver.html#feature-resolver-version-2) enabled:

```toml
[package]
name = "bug-repro"
version = "0.1.0"
authors = ["Malloc Voidstar <1284317+AlyoshaVasilieva@users.noreply.github.com>"]
edition = "2018"
resolver = "2"

[dependencies]
rocket = { git = "https://github.com/SergioBenitez/Rocket.git", rev = "d03a07b1832a2491abf76212f76339f193adb910" }
```

plus a `main.rs` containing `fn main() {}`.

```
> cargo build
[...]
   Compiling rocket_codegen v0.5.0-dev (https://github.com/SergioBenitez/Rocket.git?rev=d03a07b1832a2491abf76212f76339f193adb910#d03a07b1)
error[E0432]: unresolved import `syn::visit`
 --> C:\Users\L\.cargo\git\checkouts\rocket-8bf16d9ca7e90bdc\d03a07b\core\codegen\src\derive\form_field.rs:4:10
  |
4 | use syn::visit::Visit;
  |          ^^^^^ could not find `visit` in `syn`

error[E0432]: unresolved import `crate::syn::visit`
 --> C:\Users\L\.cargo\git\checkouts\rocket-8bf16d9ca7e90bdc\d03a07b\core\codegen\src\syn_ext.rs:6:51
  |
6 | use crate::syn::{self, Ident, ext::IdentExt as _, visit::Visit};
  |                                                   ^^^^^ could not find `visit` in `syn`

error[E0433]: failed to resolve: could not find `visit` in `syn`
   --> C:\Users\L\.cargo\git\checkouts\rocket-8bf16d9ca7e90bdc\d03a07b\core\codegen\src\derive\form_field.rs:197:14
    |
197 |         syn::visit::visit_expr_field(self, i);
    |              ^^^^^ could not find `visit` in `syn`

error[E0433]: failed to resolve: could not find `visit` in `syn`
   --> C:\Users\L\.cargo\git\checkouts\rocket-8bf16d9ca7e90bdc\d03a07b\core\codegen\src\syn_ext.rs:137:22
    |
137 |                 syn::visit::visit_type(self, ty);
    |                      ^^^^^ could not find `visit` in `syn`

error[E0433]: failed to resolve: could not find `visit` in `syn`
   --> C:\Users\L\.cargo\git\checkouts\rocket-8bf16d9ca7e90bdc\d03a07b\core\codegen\src\syn_ext.rs:167:31
    |
167 |                     _ => syn::visit::visit_type(self, ty),
    |                               ^^^^^ could not find `visit` in `syn`

error: aborting due to 5 previous errors

Some errors have detailed explanations: E0432, E0433.
For more information about an error, try `rustc --explain E0432`.
error: could not compile `rocket_codegen`

To learn more, run the command again with --verbose.
warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish...
error: build failed
```

`codegen` is using syn's visit module without actually enabling it; it gets enabled elsewhere on the old resolver (I can't figure out where). The new resolver will be [the default in Rust 2021](https://blog.rust-lang.org/2021/05/11/edition-2021.html#default-cargo-feature-resolver) and is available since 1.51.

Adding the dependency `syn = { version = "1.0", default-features = false, features = ["parsing", "visit", "visit-mut"] }` to codegen's Cargo.toml fixes this, didn't make a PR since I'm not sure if those are the complete set of features.
